text: is a Japanese football player. He plays for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Miyoshi was born in Kawasaki on March 26, 1997. He joined J1 League club Kawasaki Frontale from their youth team in 2015. He played many matches from 2016 season. In 2017, Frontale won the J1 champions first time in the club history. In 2018, he moved to Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo. In 2019, he moved to Yokohama F. Marinos. In August 2019, he moved to Belgian First Division A club Royal Antwerp. In October 2013, Miyoshi was selected the Japan U-17 national team for 2013 U-17 World Cup. In May 2017, he was selected the Japan U-20 national team for 2017 U-20 World Cup. In May 2019, he was selected the Japan national team for 2019 Copa Am√©rica. At this tournament, he debuted against Chile on June 17.
